message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.CE 

Reasoning: The paper presents a new sampling method to optimize the evaluation of preventive strategies using fixed budget best-arm identification algorithms. The method uses Bayesian best-arm identification algorithms and individual-based epidemiological models to determine the best strategy to curve epidemic spread. This involves machine learning and optimization techniques, which are commonly associated with the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). The paper also involves the use of statistical inference and decision-making, which are associated with the sub-categories of Social and Information Networks (cs.SI), Systems and Control (cs.SY), and Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE).
